Valve has filed a trademark for Steam Frame, and data mining suggests their long-rumored Deckard headset may finally be near. Linus and Luke discuss what this could mean for PC VR, inside-out tracking, wireless PC gaming, and whether Valve is leaving Lighthouse tracking behind for good.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qPen-cHdYmk

title: Valve is Making a New VR Headset!

The US Senate has introduced an amendment that could prevent Nvidia and AMD from exporting advanced GPUs while American companies still face shortages. Nvidia pushed back, calling parts of the rule “doomer science fiction.” Linus and Luke break down why this could accelerate China’s push for homegrown GPU development, and why the long-term impact may not be what US lawmakers expect.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qPen-cHdYmk

title: The U.S. Might Force NVIDIA to Keep GPUs in America
